# Government Tender Announcement: External Audits for the National Research Council Canada

## Tender Title and Reference Information
------------------------------------------

*   **Tender Title**: External Audits
*   **Reference Number**: cb-218-60620322
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-29

## Tender Description
---------------------

The National Research Council Canada invites suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of external audit services for the fiscal years 2023-24 and 2024-25. The successful supplier will be required to perform an audit of and express an opinion on the consolidated financial statements of the National Research Council of Canada.

## Tender Details
------------------

*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Solicitation Number**: 23-58130
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-23T14:00:00 (closed)
*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

## Contracting Entity Information
--------------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: National Research Council Canada
*   **Address**: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   **Name**: Roxanne Azzi Abboud
    *   **Email**: Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
    *   **Phone**: (613) 299-9650

## Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
------------------------------------------

*   This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   The successful supplier is required to conduct work in the National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario.

# Notes
--------

Tenders are to be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the solicitation document. Proposals are to be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabu
